system.description:
Also at 3rd level, you are continually under the effect of the comprehend languages spell. This is a magical effect and can be suppressed if you are in an antimagic field or similar effect, but it reactivates with no action required on your part as soon as you are outside the area of the suppressing effect.

In addition all spells from the knowledge school are added to the bard list for you, and you may select from them when learning a new bard spell.
